data: one more to see if this thing overfloats

Here is a footnote reference,[^1] another,[^longnote], and optionally there are inline notes.^[you can type them inline, which may be easier, since you don’t have to pick an identifier and move down to type the note.]

[^1]: Here is the footnote. [^longnote]: Here’s one with multiple blocks.

Subsequent paragraphs are indented to show that they
belong to the previous footnote.

    { some.code }

The whole paragraph can be indented, or just the first
line. In this way, multi-paragraph footnotes work like
multi-paragraph list items.

This paragraph won’t be part of the note, because it isn’t indented.
Following the ancient traditions of software engineers..
